product_name: Kuhl Riot Raw Denim Pants - Men's 30" Inseam
long_description: The Kuhl Riot(TM) Raw Denim pants with 30 in. inseam feature a premium cotton denim fabric with a touch of spandex for stretchy comfort on your casual days at home or quick hikes into the hills. Waistband is lined with soft sueded fabric for comfort next to skin. Gusseted crotch and articulated knees allow great range of motion. Kuhl Riot Raw Denim pants have a standard five-pocket design, plus a stealth cell phone pocket and a zippered security pocket.
short_description: The Kuhl Riot(TM) Raw Denim pants with 30 in. inseam feature a premium cotton denim fabric with a touch of spandex for stretchy comfort on your casual days at home or quick hikes into the hills.
